awd_titl_txt: Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Chemistry at the Ohio State University
awd_abstract_narration: The Ohio State University is being supported to establish a                     Research Experiences for Undergraduates (REU) SITE.  The                        purpose of this SITE is to provide meaningful hands-on research                 opportunities in contemporary chemistry for outstanding                         undergraduate students under the supervision of experienced                     research chemists.                                                                                                                                              The program will support at least 7 students for the summer of                  1987, of which almost half will be recruited from other                         institutions.                                                                                                                                                   Research activities will include the following:                                                                                                                 o  Metal Ion Catalysis                                                                                                                                          o  Reactions of Metal Cabonyls with Spirocyclic                                    Isodicyclopontadiene Systems                                                                                                                                 o  Metal Cluster Chemistry                                                                                                                                      o  Studies on Microbial Forms of Dextransucrase
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
